requirements.summary: Create a frontend interface for text prompt input, backend image generation call, and image display
acceptanceCriteria: UI includes a text input field for entering prompts
UI includes a button to trigger image generation
Generated image URL is displayed as an actual image on the page
Uses React Query for backend communication

file_operations.description: Create a React component that provides a text input field for prompts, a button to trigger image generation, and displays the returned image. Use React Query (useMutation or useQuery) to call the backend generateImage function from backend.d.ts. Display the imageUrl returned in the GenerateImageResponse as an element. Include loading and error states.
Import and render the ImageGenerator component in the main App component to make the image generation interface accessible to users.

requirements.summary: Apply a creative and cohesive visual design theme with harmonious colors (avoid blue and purple), readable typography, and clean layout
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied throughout the UI
Typography choices support readability and visual hierarchy
Layout provides clear visual flow for the prompt-to-image workflow

file_operations.description: Update global CSS to define a creative and cohesive color palette avoiding blue and purple (e.g., warm tones, earth tones, or vibrant greens/oranges). Set typography rules for readability and visual hierarchy. Ensure the design enhances the image generation experience with clean layout patterns.

Extend the Tailwind configuration to include the new color palette and typography theme. Define custom colors, font families, and spacing tokens to support the creative design theme across the application.
